resources.string: Talented software developer with more than 5 years of hands-on experience developing and maintaining full stack software applications using modern Agile SDLC methodologies, design patterns, and other industry standard techniques. Proficient in the creation, optimization, and integration of data-intensive systems, databases, queries, and analyses, driving key decision-making with vital information. Technologies known include Java, JavaScript, Spring, Hibernate, jQuery, PostgreSQL, VS Code, and IntelliJ IDEA.
